hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibrahim said:"Alqamah prayed five (rak'ahs) and when he said the taslim, Ibrahim bin Suwaid said : 'O Abu Shibl, you prayed five!' He said: 'Is that true, O odd-eyed one?' Then he prostrated two prostrations of forgetfulness, then he said: 'This is what the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) did

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَفْعَلُ مَنْ صَلَّى خَمْسًا
chapter.eng-name: What a person should do if he prays five (rak'ahs)
